Australia

The Land of Kangaroos

Country Background

A country with beautiful landscapes and great weather but is also frequently joked about for its dangerous wildlife.

People

Prefix "g'day mate" and you'll be fine. Australians are some of the most relaxed and approachable people on earth. Also good looking.

Culture

Might take awhile to get used to their slang but their isn't a lot of social etiquette to take note of. Aussies also have one of the nicest accents in the world in my opinion. Also drinking.

Food

Beer. Just kidding, love the meat pies and barbeques, also if you're adventurous, try vegemite. Also have a go at kangaroo meat while you're at it.
